sqlMap.select: select mid from medrecord where id = #id#
select mid,symptom1,symptom2,symptom3,symptom4,treattype,to_char(treatdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') treatdate from medrecord where mid = #mid# and drid = #drid# and dpname = #dpname#
sqlMap.update: update medrecord set symptom1 = #symptom1# ,symptom2 = #symptom2# ,symptom3 = #symptom3# ,symptom4 = #symptom4#, treattype = #treattype# , treatdate = #treatdate# , prescription = #prescription#, treatconfirm = #treatconfirm# where mid = #mid#
